description:
The GRAMMY Awards are presented annually by the Recording Academy. For the 68th Annual GRAMMY Awards, nominations are scheduled for November 7, 2025, and the ceremony for February 1, 2026.

This market will resolve according to the listed recording that wins Audio Book, Narration, and Storytelling recording at the 68th Annual GRAMMY Awards.

If, for any reason, no winner is declared by June 30, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, or in case of a tie for the winner, this market will resolve in favor of the listed recording that comes first in alphabetical order.

The resolution source will be the television broadcast of the awards and the Grammy website (https://www.grammy.com/); however, other credible reporting may be used.

events.title: Grammys: Best Audio Book, Narration, and Storytelling Recording Winner

groupItemTitle: Meditations: The Reflections Of His Holiness The Dalai Lama - Dalai Lama
question: Will "Meditations: The Reflections Of His Holiness The Dalai Lama - Dalai Lama" win Best Audio Book, Narration, and Storytelling Recording at the 68th annual GRAMMY Awards?
